result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيۡنَٰكَهُمۡ فَلَعَرَفۡتَهُم بِسِيمَٰهُمۡۚ وَلَتَعۡرِفَنَّهُمۡ فِي لَحۡنِ ٱلۡقَوۡلِۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
result.translation: 30. Kaadu faxinninoy (nabiyow) ken koo ayballayuk neneeh, ken astootil ken aaxaguk ten. Kaadu Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; maxcok obsal (saaqiyyol) ken aaxigettooh. Yalli sin taamoomi yaaxigeh.
